attributes.action: sign the Hope Not Hate petition protesting the BNP presence in the European Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BNP have won seats in the European Parliament, but they do not represent Britain. By signing the Hope Not Hate petition, the Prime Minister and Cabinet can set an example and stand with the public against racism and division.

All signers of this No 10 e-petition are also urged to sign the original Hope Not Hate petition themselves.
